name: Exchange Information Store Database
summary: Learn about .EDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Priv1.edb and Pub1.edb are the main EDB files used for the Exchange information store. They each have a corresponding .STM file that contains SMTP messages.

description: An EDB file is a database created by Microsoft Exchange Server. It serves as the main repository for the mailbox data saved by Exchange. EDB files store both in-process and stored non-SMTP messages, formatted using a b-tree structure that includes a top-level node and many child nodes.
